name: Methanediol
desc: Methanediol, also known as formaldehyde monohydrate or methylene glycol, is an organic compound with chemical formula CH2(OH)2. It is the simplest geminal diol, and formally the second simplest carbohydrate (after formaldehyde).

images.alt: Skeletal formula of methanediol with some explicit hydrogens added
Ball and stick model of the methanediol

Other names:
Formald hydrate
Formaldehyde monohydrate
Methylene glycol
